Mailing Address: PO Box 202221434 Graham StKelowna, BC     V1Y 7N3
Service Details: - Provides daytime support, as well as monitoring and supervision, to youth aged 13 - 18 years that have been referred to the Kelowna Youth Justice House while under a 24/7 supervision order by the courts- Program staff assist youth by transporting them to scheduled appointments with community professionals, and also provide direct support to youth in addressing outstanding issues and facilitating compliance with their court orders- Program staff and youth focus on developing and maintaining a day plan focusing on school, meeting official appointments, recreation/pro-social activities, life-skills and vocational/employment related assistance
Eligibility: Ages: 13 year(s) - 18 year(s)These services are referred to by the courts and are free of charge
